text: Sergio Castellitto (born 18 August 1953) is an Italian director, actor, and screenwriter. In 2024, he played Cardinal Tedesco in the mystery thriller movie Conclave. ==Directing works== Year Title Notes 1999 Libero Burro 2004 Don't Move 2010 Love & Slaps 2012 Twice Born 2015 You Can't Save Yourself Alone 2017 Lucky ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian movie producers Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome Category:Writers from Rome
title: Sergio Castellitto
